duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and oversee childcare programs and activities for children in a safe and engaging environment.
Collaborate with other childcare staff and parents to ensure a positive and supportive atmosphere for children.
Manage scheduling and staffing for childcare shifts, ensuring coverage and optimal ratios of staff to children.
Maintain a reliable and consistent presence during childcare shifts to provide support and supervision for children.
Create and maintain a flexible schedule to accommodate the needs of children and their families.
Ensure a positive team environment and encourage teamwork among childcare staff.
